111222.content: Should it be either Sailor Jupiter (Aka Lita), or Sailor Venus (Aka Mina)?
111222.title: Jupiter, or Venus?

1112222.content:
Sailor Venus awoke to find herself bound in stocks with her hands secured above her head. She was dazed and confused as she attempted to gain a bearing of her surroundings. A door creaked and a dark robed figure approached her.
“Who are you?!” Mina demanded, yet she received no reply. “What do you want with me?” she asked. The figure gazed at her beneath his hood. After a brief silence, he spoke, “Sailor Venus, my name is of little consequence to you. As for my motives, they shall be revealed to you in due time. Before doing so, I have a few questions for you that I would love to have answered.”
“I have nothing to say to you. I definitely do not know anything. Wait, I mean I know something, just nothing that is really important.”
“For one of such beauty, you truly have a dieseling intellect. As for your situation, you and the other scouts are confined in similar predicaments in various locations of this realm. You were battling the Nega-verse - is it? Yes, well, during your struggle you managed to prevent the destruction of your planet, however, you did manage to tear a hole in the time space continuum.”
“The what?...”
“Wow, beauty with brains truly is hard to come by. I guess you are fortunate that I do not care for the latter. All you need to know is that you are now located here in my realm. I have been sent here to gather information about you and physical torture is banned here. We do not feel that pain is the best way to extract information.”
Venus smirked and thought to herself - That’s a relief because I’m not really one for pain.
“We have other methods of persuasion if you choose not to cooperate…Sailor Venus, what is the name of your home planet?”
“Venus? No wait, Earth or is it Venus? Do you mean which planet am I from or which planet do I live on?”
“Did you just answer my question with a question? Do you seriously not know where you are from? Is there a difference?”
“…In the planets? One is larger than the other.”
“This is unbelievable. These proceedings are getting us no where. You leave me no choice, you are refusing to cooperate and it is time for me to take drastic measures.”
“What are you going to do to me?” Mina’s voice quivered.
The robed figure stepped forward and spoke in a low whisper. “Where do you want it blondie – under the arm? the soles of your feet?”
1112222.title: Mina

11122221.content:
Sailor Venus’s eyes filled with dread. She swallowed hard. The robe figure spoke, “Since you refuse to answer, I shall choose for you.” A robed hand reached out of the shadows and removed Sailor Venus’ orange heels. “Most spectacular, you keep your feet in a marvelous condition. Your soles appear so smooth.”
Mina blushed, “Well I like to make sure that I keep all types of boys interested. I need to cover all of my bases.”
“Do you always blurt out random things or is that just an occurrence in this realm? On second thought don’t answer that.” The robed figure rubbed his hands up and down her feet. “Your soles are so smooth and flawless.” “Thank you for the foot massage. It feels so nice.” Mina sighed with delight.
“What?! I haven’t started yet.” The robed figure took his hand away and when it reemerged it held a long, white feather. He smirked underneath his hood. “Now the fun beings…” He twirled the feather around. “Now…talk.”
He ran the feather up and down Mina’s left exposed sole. The sensations were too much for Mina to control herself. She was extremely ticklish on the soles of her feet. “Whhhhaaaattttt! AAAAAAAAAHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH, OH MY GOD, AAAAAIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!! HHHAAAHHHAAAAHAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!” Mina’s uncontrollable laughter rang out as the feather caressed her sole. “What do you want?” she stammered.
The robed figure’s voice was cold“…just laugh.” He moved the feather from her left sole to her neglected right one. This drove Mina into hysterics. The feather moved up and down her bare sole, darting from one to the other as he pleased.
“OH MY GOD!! STTTTOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPLLLLLLLLLEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAASEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE. AHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAA!!!!!! OH, I CANT STAND IT!! PLEEEEEAASEEEE…..NO…..MMMMOOORREEE…AAAHHHHHAAAAAAAAAHHHHAAAAAA”
“What was that? More?!” The robed figure took out a second feather. He moved each feather to its own sole trajectory. The feathers stroking up and down her bare soles was too much for Mina to bear.
“AAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAA!!! BAAAAHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAA IEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHAAAAAAAAAA.”
Mina’s laughter echoed throughout her confined quarters. Underneath his hood, the shrouded figure was smiling, his eyes glowing red. “Good…good…laugh, laugh. I love it. I command it. LAUGH!!”
“AAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAA!!!”
After what seemed like ages, the robe figure ceased his vicious onslaught on Mina’s flawless, helpless soles. Mina panted, exhausted from the ordeal.
A voice was heard form the shadows, “She needs the chemical compound H2O - they call it water. We found that out when the one in blue lost consciousness (Sailor Mercury). “
The robed figure left the room and returned with the liquid substance. He extended a cup and spoke “Drink Venus. I need for you to keep your strength up. Your interrogation is far from over.”
11122221.title: Soles of her feet

111222211.content:
Mina’s parched lips were grateful for the waters sweet release. The dark robed figure watched her for a brief time admiring her bound figure. “Venus, are you willing to cooperate?” Mina screamed, “I have NO IDEA what you want!”
“Shall we start off with a simple question? What is your name? – Your true identity. ” Mina remained silent, hesitant. The question was asked again. “Do you have any other aliases? Answer me!” His voice was calm, yet forceful. “Very well, you have made your decision. Where were we? Oh yes, your feet…”
Mina’s eyes widened as her feet struggled against their bonds. The white feathers appeared once more within her captors skillful hands. She knew her impending fate. As the feathers grazed her smooth skin, the tickling sensations pulsed through her. She fought valiantly against the urge to succumb to the impending spasmodic laughter. Yet her torturer’s will was too skilled, his swift movements of the feathers across her sensitive soles proved too much for her and she could not resist. Mina’s laughter was uncontrollable. “AHHAHAHHHAHAHHAAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA! You monster! HAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHHAAAHHAHAHA!! NOOOTTTT MMYYYY FFFFFFFFFFFFFEEEEEEEEETTTTTTTTTTT!!! OHHHHHHHHHHHH GOOOODDDDDDD AHHAHAHHAHAHAAHAHAHAAHAAAHAAHAHAAHAHAAHAHAAHA!!!!! IEEEEEIIIIIIIAAHHHHHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHA!!!!! WHHYYYYY?!!! IEEEEEEEEAAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAAAHHHHAAAA!!!”
Mina’s torment was music to her captor’s ears. He yearned to hear her melodious voice expelled in uncontrollable laughter. He drew comfort and strength from it. He skillfully manipulated the feathers in each of his hands tracing up and down Mina’s bare soles. Up and down her high arches. Tracing the sides of her feet, he teased her toes running the feathers between and around them. He titillated every part of her foot gaining the most enjoyment out of caressing her flawlessly smooth soles with the tips of his enchanted feathers. His actions only furthered Mina’s predicament spurned on even further by every plea and form of laughter from her lips.
“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAH!!! SSSSSTTTOOOPPP!!! PPLLLEEEEASSEEE IIIIIIIIIIIEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH. I CAN’T STAND IT!!!! AAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAAHAAHHAHHHAAHHHAAA! MY FEEEEEETTTTTT!!! AAAHAHAHAHAHAHAA!!! ARE SOOOOO TICKLISH!!!!! AAHAHAHAHAAHHAA!!! I’LLL DDOOOO ANNYTHING AAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHHAHAH!!!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA!!!”
The feathers abruptly ceased their assault. Mina wheezed from her exertion, yet still managed to utter. “Thank you…” The reply she received was not what she had hoped. “You are far from broken. I shall let you rest for now, but I shall also allow you to witness what you have endured. One of your friends shall be joining you in this chamber. She will be placed right next to you. You will regain your strength as you watch the interrogation process and if she too proves unwilling to cooperate, then she too will need to be…persuaded.”
111222211.title: Return to her feet

1112222111.content:
Sailor Mars along with the other scouts had been held in a stasis field chamber. This field restricted the awareness senses while heightening the physical receptors of the skin. When she was transported to Mina’s side, she felt disoriented. Her hands were bound above her head exposing her underarms to an unknown potential peril. Her legs were extended in front of her as she seemed to float in place restrained by an unknown energy. Her red heels still remained on her feet. “Where am I?” She spoke aloud what her mind thought.
The robed figure compared Mina to Rei from the comfort of the shadows. “My dear, you are in my realm. As I’ve told you friend here, you will tell me everything I ask of you or you will suffer the consequences.” Rei used her spiritual training and meditation to focus and quickly became aware of her surroundings. “Mina!! Where are we?” Rei blurted out.
The robe figure said that name with some what reverence. “Mina…so that is your true name Venus. Mina. It appears your friend may be more useful than I have previously intended. I and my kind do not take kindly to trespassers in our realm. Women in red, Mars - is it? No matter, you will answer my questions. If you do not, then you shall face the same fate as Mina.”
Rei looked at Mina. She saw Mina’s body bound, barefoot and panting. She appeared exhausted, yet no bruising or form of torture could be visibly seen. “Mina, what did they do to you?”
The robed figure answered, “You shall find out in due time.”
“What do you want to know? Why have you brought us here?” Rei demanded.
“I will be the one asking questions here.” The voice was direct, filled with resolve. “You and your friends tore a tear in the space time continuum and entered our realm. Whether on accident or by choice, we will gain knowledge of you and your people. Your strengths…and your weaknesses...”
“We mean you no harm. We did not willing enter your realm.” Rei protested.
“Do not speak such lies. No such power could have been generated by your kind to enter this realm without due cause. Nothing happens by coincidence. Everything has a purpose. Why are you here?”
“I don’t know where here is? Where are my friends? What have you done to Mina? Answer me!” Rei shouted.
“Such fire, we have ways to deal with such brazen insolence. I started with Mina’s lower half and liked it so much the first time, I had a second. Yet with you I shall start from the top and work my way down.”
“What are you talking about?” Rei inquired.
“You shall see. You shall see.” He responded.
The robed figure approached Rei and walked up beside her. “This is your last chance. Why are you here?” “I don’t know!” Rei responded. “We shall see.” was her reply.
The robed figure cracked his knuckles. “This is for a more personal touch. You will understand soon enough.” He placed his hands just outside her underarms. He stood directly behind her so she would have little warning as to his attacks. He struck with his right hand, grazing the inside of her underarm ever so gently - Nothing. He tried the other with no avail.
“Hey! What are you doing?” Rei asked. The robed figure placed his hands directly on her underarms and wiggled his fingers with a ravenous onslaught. Rei’s face twitched and distorted as she struggled against her bonds. Her lips began to quiver as her eyes twitched. Rei erupted. “What are you doing you freak? I’m not ticklish!”
The robed figure stopped. “We shall see. We have other areas and methods.” He conjured two enchanted feathers and twirled them with anticipation. “Let’s see how well you handle this approach.”
He glided the feathers over Rei’s smooth underarms. Rei jumped and jerked, yet refused to laugh. “You are far more resistant than Mina. I enjoyed her torment far more than yours; however, I am always up for a challenge. I guess it is time to move southward.”
The robed figure moved to Rei’s feet. He looked at her ruby heels and scoffed. “These will have to go.’” He removed her heels and they dropped to the ground. Rei protested, “Leave my shoes on you freak.”
The robed figure looked at her feet. Her nails wore red nail polish and we well groomed. Rei had an average arch. Her soles were creamy smooth white and well kept. Rei’s yelling broke his gaze and his perceived silence. “You freak, when I get out of here, you will pay.”
The robed figure said nothing he merely assaulted her soles with feathers. He skillfully ran his feathers up and down her bare soles and waited – nothing. He traced along the sides of her feet, danced around her toes and grazed her soles – nothing. He continued yet focused his gaze on her face instead of her soles. Rei had closed her eyes and was channeling her focus to resist her torturer’s methods.
“You are strong willed, but you too can be broken.” With those words, another robed figure appeared behind Rei. His hands skillfully teased and prodded her slender underarms. His skillful prodding coupled with the feathers assault on her creamy soles broke Rei’s concentration. Her eyes widen and her body convulsed. “NNNNNOOOOOO---AAAAAHHHHHHAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHAAHAHHAHAHAHAAHAH!!!!!!!!!! IIIIIIIEEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHAAAAAHAHAHAHAAHAHAAHAHAHAAHA!!! OH MY GODDDDDDD AAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAAAHAHAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAHAAHAAAHAAH!!!”
Fingers traced the curves of her underarms and followed her torso to her ribs, counting each one individually; applying more attention to areas that proved more sensitive. Her body fought against it as the feathers traced her soles. Up and down her arches and in-between her toes, her feet battled against their feathery assailants, but to no avail. They were trapped and could not escape. “AAHAHAHAHAHAAHHAAHAHAHAHHAAHHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!! You fiend!!!!!!! HHHHHAHAHAHAHAAHAHHAHHAAHHAHAHAH!!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAAHHAHHAHAHAAHAHAH!! IIIEEEEEEEEEEAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAAA.” Rei’s torment endured.
Mina watched on powerless to help her friend. She watched on as the feathers caressed the soles of Rei’s feet and her body contorted to attempt a vain resistance against an inescapable assault. Mina knew the torment she had endured and could only imagine what Rei was expecting even though she was witnessing it before her eyes – sheer agony.
The robed figure stopped tickling Rei’s creamy soles. The hands ceased their assault. Rei slumped over exhausted. The robed figure turned to face Mina. “Now, are you ready to talk or shall we go again?”
Mina's eyes widened. "Please don't. I don't know anything!" She pleaded.
"Very well." The robe figure walked towards Mina feathers in hand. "Don't worry, this will be fun..."
1112222111.title: Mars

11122221112.content:
Mina watched the feathers move closer to her vulnerable soles with each passing moment. She felt the feathers soft never relenting movement against her smooth, flawless skin. Her feet attempted to escape, but could not flee from the feathers’ titillating grasp. She succumbed to their power once more. “HAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAHHHHHHAHHHHHHHHHHHHHAAAA!!! WHYYYYY-IIIIIIAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAAHHAHAHAHAAHHHHHHHAAAAAHHHH! OH COOOOMEEEEEEE ONNNNNNNN!!! AAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAA!!! I DON’T KNOW ANNNYYYYYTHINGGGG AHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHHHHHAA BBBBIIEELIEVEEEE MEEEE AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA OH OH OH NOOOO NOT THEREEEEHERE?!!! AHAHAHAAHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAAH!!!” Mina’s laughter was unstoppable. She wished she could stop her tormentor, but she did not know what he desired. The feathers ceased their exploration of her delicate soles. “Mina, I think you have endured enough for the moment. Drink some water.” A robed figure appeared behind her and forced her to drink. She choked on the water. “I do not know anything! What do you want from me – from us?” Mina pleaded.
The robed figure near her feet answered her, “What do I want? I wish torture you until you cooperate giving us the truth. We want to know why you are here. You tell us that you do not know. As if you accidently came into our realm and have no idea as to how to return to your own…”
“BUT that IS what happened!” Mina interrupted.
“That is truly hard to fathom such a blunder. Maybe you need some more influencing…”
The feathers inched towards Mina’s soles. “NOOOOO!!!” She pleaded. Yet to her surprise, feathers began tickling her underarms. “WHHAATTT – TTAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAAHAHHA!!!” The feathers caressed her underarms with soft, firm brushes grazing the curves of her anatomy forcing Mina to experience even more agony. As the feathers stimulated her arm’s crevices, Mina felt the familiar stimulations on her bare soles. This drove her into hysteria.
“AHAHAHHHHHHHHAHAAAAAAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHA!! IIIIIIIEEEEEEEAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHA! OH MY ARCHES!!! AHAHHAAHAHH MY PITS, NOT THE PITSSSIIIIIAAAAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHHAAHAHAHAHAHAAHAH!!!! STTTTTTOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPP AAAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAAHHAHAAHHAHAHAHA OHHHHHHHHH MMMMMMYYYYYYY GGGGGGGGOOOOOOODDDDDDD AHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAA!!”
Mina’s laughter resounded within the confines of the chamber as her body writhed in response to the feathers exploration of her body’s sensitive areas. The feathers at her feet traced her soles, up and down, outlined her feet, and circled her toes. Those at her arms brushed and browsed her smooth underarms finding the most sensitive crevices. Mina howled and heaved as she succumbed to her body’s limits and passed out from the excursion.
The robed figure ceased his torment. “She has been tamed, I think, if not it doesn’t matter. Revive her, tend to her needs. When she awakes inform me. I’ve taken a fondness to her…Bring me another! The one in red is of no use to me!”
11122221112.title: feet and torso

111222211121.content:
Sailor Pluto was chosen from the remaining lot and appeared before the robed figure. Her hands were bound behind her and her legs were restrained with dark energy. She was well aware of her surroundings and studied them intently. “You are different from your counterparts. You may be of some use to us. Your companions were far less cooperative and provided little useful information, however, their time spent with me was most enjoyable.”
“What did you do to them?” asked Pluto.
“What is it with this concern for others – all of you seem to possess this quality, fascinating. Your friends refused to cooperate with us so we had to persuade them. Our methods proved rather taxing on their constitutions, yet in due time, they will see the error of their ways.”
“What do you want from us?” Pluto’s voice was calm.
“Information – where do you come from? Why are you here? What is your purpose?”
“I am the guardian of time in our universe. There was a battle, a massive amount of energy was released then darkness. We found ourselves here. I am unfamiliar with anything in this realm, this must be another dimension. You must be our captor.”
“You are perceptive. I merely hold you and your entourage in these restraints because I desire knowledge of you and your species. I wish to know your strengths, weaknesses, physiology and psychological nuances. My kind has the ability to read the energy signatures of others and find the flaws in anything. You have few, yet those that are visible to us will be exploited if force is necessary.”
Pluto’s gaze left his and looked at the condition of Mars and Venus. Rei was bound by an unknown energy keeping her suspended in the air. Her black hair enveloped her as her breathing slowed. Mina’s unconscious form lie suspended within dark energy stocks. She was slumped forward her hair cascading around her. Her breathing was shallow. Neither of them appeared harmed by any method that left them horribly scarred, yet it appeared both of them had undergone an extensive interrogation session.
Pluto’s eyes bore into the hood of the robed figure. “I do not know what you have done too my friends nor do I know what you have in-store for me if I do not answer you questions, but I will tell you what I know to be the truth – whether you accept it, is another.” Pluto recounted their occurrences which matched the descriptions given by Rei and Mina.
"It matches your comrades' tale. Such cohesion to hide well made plans. No matter, have her join her friends. Bind her up. I'll make her talk."
111222211121.title: Pluto

121.content:
It was in the middle of the night. Yet another day had been spent battling against team rocket. Once again Brock had fallen in love, only to be foiled by Misty. Brock was lying in his room at the starfish hotel, which he was sharing with Misty.

"Man," he thought, "Why can't she leave me alone for once." Thinking of the matter only made his lust for revenge even more maddening. Just when he was thinking he would go mad, he got an idea. An EEEEEEEEEVIL idea. He smiled to himself, planning what he would do. then as soon as he thought everything was silent, He tiptoed out of bed. He started to sneak around the room until he towered over Misty, who was still in bed. and slowly and carefully, he pulled back the covers. He picked up Togepi out of her arms. then he gently took the Pokemon and slid it out into Ash's room. Then he turned to face his prize.

He savored the moment a while, anticipation surging through him. Then he quickly and quietly took out his lengths of rope from his "outdoor survival" pack, and tied her arms and legs to the sides of the bed. As soon as he started to tie her waist down, she slowly awakens. With a jolt, she realizes that she is tied up. Uttering gasps of surprise, she tries to break free. twisting and turning, she realizes that it is no use. She was trapped.

Misty looked fearfully and anxiously at Brock, who was standing triumphantly over her. "Hahahahaha!" Brock laughed. "Tonight, I have my revenge!"

what do you do?

1241.content:
Hikari sighed as she walked down a barely visible path, deep in the heart of a forest. It had been a while since she had decided to travel on her own, but she still found it hard to have no other people to talk to - Pokemon didn't make the best conversationalists. When she was still traveling with Ash and Brock, she at least wasn't alone when they got lost, as she was now. Frustrated, she sat down on a log to think.

After a while, she could hear voices coming from the direction she was heading. Without hesitating, she began walking again, hoping to find someone that could help her out of her predicament. She neared a clearing and paused; the women she saw were familiar to her, but in an undesirable way. They were members of Team Galaxy, who she had a bit of a bad history with. She had foiled a plan of theirs to capture some Legendary Pokemon, and played a part in finding them new places to live and hide in safety. Since then, she had trouble with them on numerous occasions trying to hunt her down to get the information from her.

"This isn't good," she thought, ducking behind a tree. "I'll have to take a longer route now. I'll be in trouble if they find me now, there's too many of them." Cautiously, she peeked out from her hiding spot to see what they were up to. Her eyes widened slightly when she noticed that one of them was missing. Too late to react, she noticed her vision blurring as a strange cloud of dust swirled around her. As she passed out, the missing Galaxy Member smiled and knelt down to pick Hikari up.
1241.title: Lost and Found

12411.content:
Hikari awoke with a start when she tried to roll onto her side and found herself unable to do so. She glanced around at her surroundings, which appeared to be the inside of a cabin. "Hey, she's awake." A feminine voice said. "Good, I was getting bored." Two teenage girls clad in Team Galaxy uniforms approached Hikari on either side, watching her struggle in vain.

She was strapped to an X-Frame table, with soft leather straps holding down her wrists, elbows, thighs, knees and ankles. She was effectively immobilized, capable only of shaking her head from side to side, or wiggling her hands and feet lightly. She was still fully clothed, but she didn't take notice of it - her attention was on the Galaxy Members grinning down at her. "What do you want with me?" She asked, her voice hinting that she was fearful of the situation. The Galaxy girl with long black hair laughed and waved her hand dismissively. "Come on, you know exactly what we want with you. You messed up our Bosses plans, and we want to know where you hid those Pokemon."

Hikari glared at them. "I'm not going to tell you that! They're innocent creatures! Not your tools!" The other Galaxy Member with short blonde hair shrugged. "We have a long, long time for you to change your mind about that, hun. You aren't going anywhere unless we decide to take you to our Head Quarters." Wasting no time, the blonde blindfolded Hikari, causing her anxiety to hit the roof. "W-What are you going to do to me?"

Have fun, you two." With that, she left. Hikari bit her lower lip and tried to think of a way out of this. 15522222222111.content:
Urd couldn't even recall what had happened. All she remembered was her vision becoming somewhat blurry and she felt incredibly dizzy before passing out. How long she had been out was a complete mystery. The Goddesses eyes slowly fluttered open to the sight of the ceiling in her own bedroom. She was back? But she didn't remember turning around....

It was only when she tried to stretch and move her limbs that she realized something was terribly wrong. At some point, she had been restrained in the X position with leather straps. They proved to be more than strong enough to hold her down even when she tugged on them with all of her strength. Starting to panic, she looked down and noticed that all of her clothing was still on except for her shoes which had been removed and tossed onto the floor. Her snowy white colored anklet length socks were still on her size 10 feet.

"What!? What's going on here!?" Shen shouted after giving up on trying to free herself from her bonds.

"Oh? You finally woke up! It's about time~." You say cheerfully, walking over and sitting down on the edge of the bed. "I never thought you would! But since you're up, I can start having lots of fun~."

"Lots of fun? What are you talking about? Just let me out of these things!" She shouted.

"Nah. Not gonna happen~." You say back, crawling down to Urd's sock clad feet and making yourself nice and comfy.

"Don't...."

"Don't? Don't what, Urd?" You ask again, a grin forming on your face.

"Don't tickle me." She replied, her socked toes slowly curling.

"How did you know I was gonna tickle you hmm?"

"It's obvious. You're laying right at my feet, my shoes are stripped off and well...it's easy to put two and two together at that point."

"Fair enough. And yes I am going to tickle you. Well I'm gonna tickle your feet anyway. I picked the perfect time too. There's no one hear but the two of us!" You say excitedly. Reaching down, you take hold of Urd's right foot, the one you're laying closest to and it IMMEDIATELY tenses up, stretching back as her toes flex and then relax back into their normal position in response to your touch. It's enough to make your heart race.

"So you're ticklish huh?"

"Who knows? Wouldn't tell you even if I was." She replied, still trying to remain defiant even in the face of being tickled senseless.

"It's fine. My intention is to find out regardless. Makes it more fun if you resist like this anyway." You say back. Taking only your index finger, you begin to slowly trace it along Urd's socked arch.

"Tch...annoying..." She groans, her big toe flexing a couple of times while the other four remain perfectly still. But you don't pull back and instead continue to slide it against her arch without saying anything back.

Her big toe starts flexing every few seconds again and this time you couldn't have sworn you heard a giggle. It seems like your hard work is paying off. But it's up to you to decide what to do from here.

Of course such actions usually tend to make the stealee very angry, which brings us to why Misao was running in the first place.

The student of kempo was very fast and had no trouble evading those who would wish her harm. At this very moment she turned back to gague the distance between her and the band of merchants. Unfortunately for her, she failed to notice the sheath of a sword sticking out right behind her head, and the girl ran into it at full speed rendering her unconscious.

"What on earth did I hit?" She thought as consciousness slowly began to seep back into her, "And *where* on earth am I?" She tried to rub her head, but was impeded by some force around her wrists. In shock Misao's eyes shot open, revealing that she was...
1552222222222222212.title: Misao Gets It

15522222222222222121.content:
Misao realized that she was in the middle of a forest tied in a very vulnerable position between four trees. The Oniwabanshu member (still fully clothed) tried struggling, but realized quickly that it was in vain. Whoever had tied the ropes made sure she was not able to untie them, as there were no knots present. Apparently they were tied behind the trees, and these weren't mere merchants. Voices could be heard a few meters away, but she could only catch part of what was said.

"So... do with 'er?"

"I say... into..."

"No no no! We should just **** her right now!" That one could be heard in full, and it brough new anger to Misao's mind. How dare they even think about that!

"Men! Quiet this immoral babble!" This voice sounded authoritative yet weary with the world, "The girl only needs to be taught a lesson, and we must not harm her! We will *never* bring ourselves to becoming common bandits!!" Misao's worries were put on hold as the 16 year old mused over the power of the man's speech, and of course the fact that he seemed to be their leader and in favor of not killing her. Footsteps could be heard coming closer.

A group of men, most looking to be in their early twenties but one looking to be abour forty. This man knelt beside Misao and spoke (suprisingly) in a fatherly tone.

"Dear girl, what is stolen is stolen, but when one commits a crime they should be prepared to face the consequences. We will not hurt you in any way, but my men and I agree that you must be taught a lesson you will not soon forget."

Misao replied in her usual manner, "Like what? Forcing me to run around in rags with you for a week? Making me work to pay off the money? I can take anything you throw at me!!"

"Not quite," one of the younger men said, "Dearie, are you by any chance ticklish?"

A look of horror shot across Misao's face for a mere millisecond before her training kicked in. If she were to say "yes" then it would make them test it. But if she gave a location- that would work. Give location, feign torment, and get off the hook without so much as a feather laid on her, "Oh *yes*, especially behind my knees. I just *die* whenever I'm tickled there!"

While that was entirely "inconspicuous," the leader picked up on it. Only an idiot wouldn't, "Men," He said, "tickle this girl over every square inch of her body with the exception of her knees. You'll get no results there."

The younger men moved forward as the elder stepped back. Misao realized that she was up **** creek with out a paddle now, and so resorted to a pitiful shaking of her head "no." This only pumped the men up as they reached for her...

155222222222222222222222211221.content:
Ishizu scowled at the cowled figures that surrounded her. Marik's henchmen had lost no time confronting her as soon as news reached them that she was in this city. She had forseen that the'd corner here at the museum after hours, and that had been part of why she'd given the Egytian God Card to Seto Kaiba. However she had also foreseen what was to come and she had to suppress a shudder.

"You have something that belongs to the boss," said one of the Rare Hunters. "And he will have it."

"I do not have what my brother seeks," Ishizu said in a patient voice. "What you want is not here."

"Oh, I'm not so certain about that," said another rare hunter who grinned wolfishly. "Perhaps you're lying to us?"

"I have no reason to lie, and you will not hurt me," Ishizu said matter of factly.

"Perhaps," said the first Rare Hunter. "The boss did say not to harm you if we could help it, but we might be able to find another way to see if you're telling the truth."

He motioned to one of the idle Rare Hunters, who brought a chair and a rope. He then motioned for Ishizu to sit down.

Eyes closed, Ishizu padded to the chair and sat down, not giving any indication of resistance. This was after all the fate she'd foreseen in the necklace. Rough hands then tied her hands behind the chair while more rough hands tied her ankles together. When they were done tying her up, she opened her eyes to give each and every one of the rare hunters in the room an icy look.

"Keh keh keh!" chuckled one of the men. "I wonder how long you'll last?"

To the mortal races which in danger of being overrun by monsters, they gifted them with falna, bits of their own divine strength, and created familias with those they blessed. Now, these familias have gathered in Orario with one purpose: to conquer the birthplace of all monsters, the Dungeon!
         Will you tickle the protagonist's goddess, Hestia?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222221.title: The Dungeon City!

1552222222222222222222222222222222222221.content:
No? That's fine. There are others!

          Once a thief, now protagonist Bell Cranel's supporter, Liliruca Arde holds a rather dubious past. "Lili" is a prum, a physically small species considered to be worse than even humans due to their lack of both physical and magical gifts. She was horribly mistreated due to adventurers' prejudice against supporters and her inability to fight. Even in her own familia, she was an outcast. She wanted nothing more than to leave the familia, but was told to pay a huge sum of money if she wished to leave. So, in order to pay off her debt and get revenge on adventurers, she began robbing the very adventurers she supported and pawning off their items. At first, she joined Bell's party in order to rob him of all his valuables, but upon doing so, she was attacked by her familia members. She was robbed of all she owned and left to die, but Bell came back to save her despite her betrayal. This action earned her loyalty (and her love) and now she does her best to support him and the other party members. Will you tickle her?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222221.title: Others

1552222222222222222222222222222222222221.content:
Not interested in Lili? Then let's try a human this time.

         Yamato Mikoto's first, while brief, meeting with Bell was when she was running from monsters. With her party injured and she herself being unable to defeat them, she used Bell's party as bait to escape from the Dungeon. However, that was not the end of their relationship. Upon learning that Bell's party had not returned from the Dungeon after that incident, feeling guilty, she begged forgiveness from Hestia and joined a search party in order to find the missing party. Later on, when Bell was attacked by a lustful god who wanted him to join his familia, Mikoto left her own Familia to join Bell's so she could pay back her debt. Surprisingly, she is the only female in the Hestia Familia who is not in love with Bell. Instead, she is in love with her own god, Takemikazuchi. Will you tickle her?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222221.title: The Eastern Ninja

1552222222222222222222222222222222222221.content:
If Mikoto isn't to your liking, let's give her childhood friend a try.

         Though she wished for help, Sanjouno Haruhime was not some princess waiting to be rescued. In fact, she was the exact opposite: a prostitute from the Red Light District. Women that were scorned in books and stories. Someone completely undeserving of being saved. And for a long time, that's exactly what she believed. In her mind, a dirty, tainted being like herself did not deserve to be saved by a pure hero. This belief began to change when she met Bell in the strangest of scenarios: in a room where she expected a client as he was trying to hide from her lustful Familia members. After a brief misunderstanding, they spoke and befriended each other, with Bell expressing a desire to help her, but was rejected by her beliefs. Later on, Bell learned that Haruhime's Familia was planning to sacrifice her life because of her powers as a renart, a fox-like species that excelled in magic. With the help of her childhood friend Mikoto, he fought to save her, ignoring her protests and deciding that though she may be tainted, she was not beyond saving (It was only later that Bell would find out that she was, in fact, still a virgin.). After the battle had finished, Haruhime joined the Hestia Familia to have a new beginning and to be closer to the boy she had fallen in love with.

Will you tickle her?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222221.title: The Innocent Prostitute

info.brief_description: Pick your favorite anime girl, and have fun tickling her sensless. Now for sale...
info.description:
This is an interactive tickling story centered focused on girls from all animes. I'll accept any, and all additions provided that they remain centered around the main concept of anime females being tickled.

That being said go nuts.

I no longer wish to keep this story... I'm willing to transfer it to someone else for 50000 GP. (This includes the transfer fee) Drop me a line if interested in owning this interactive.
